alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Worcester and southwestern Middlesex Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boylston, or near Shrewsbury, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Northborough, Clinton, Sterling, West Boylston, Boylston and Berlin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
